'''1st Ascension Passives''' are passive [[Talents]] unlocked at [[Character#Ascensions|Ascension]] Phase 1 of each [[Character]]. Ascension Phase 1 is available at character level 20.

Often, these passives provide an improvement to a Combat Talent of the character.
